summary: Filmmaker Alex Gibney investigates the fact that the 400 richest Americans control more wealth than the 150 million people in the bottom 50 percent of the population.
cast: Alex Gibney|Jack Abramoff|Michele Bachmann|Bruce Bartlett|John Boehner|Carol Browner|George W. Bush|Eric Cantor|April Dunkley|Colin Dunkley|Michael Gross|Garrett Gruener|Jacob Hacker|Robert Kaiser|David H. Koch|Jane Mayer|Mahlon Mitchell|Ralph Nader|Timothy Noah|Barack Obama|Tim Phillips|Paul Piff|Mark Pocan|Ayn Rand|Mitt Romney|Anne Rueth|Paul Ryan|Jeffrey Sachs|Chuck Schumer|Stephen A. Schwarzman|Tim Smeeding|Karen Tredwell|Scott Walker|Jeff Wingert|Liz Wingert
title: Park Avenue: Money, Power and the American Dream
